department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: To establish a Supply Arrangement for the provision of various configurations of Low Bed Trailers with the Department of National Defence (DND) on behalf of the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).
description: Supply Arrangement for the provision of various configurations of Low Bed Trailers.
full_summary:
### Lowbed Trailers - Government Tender Announcement

#### Official Invitation #WS3756167237

**Publication Date:** February 17, 2023  
**Call Closing Date:** March 15, 2028, 2:00 pm Eastern Standard Time (EST)

### Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), has issued an invitation to submit a Request for Supply Arrangement for the provision of various configurations of Lowbed Trailers. The Supply Arrangement will be valid until Canada determines it is no longer advantageous to use it.

### Procurement Details

*   **Classification:** Vehicle bodies and trailers (25180000) and Product and material trailers (25181700)
*   **Trade Agreements:** The procurement is open to companies subject to the following trade agreements: Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.
*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **End User Entities:** Federal Government Departments, Agencies, and Crown Corporations listed in Schedules I, I.1, II, III, of the Financial Administration Act, R.S.C., 1985, c. F-11

### Eligibility Criteria

To be eligible, companies must:

*   Submit all required documentation and the bid by 2:00 pm EST on March 15, 2028
*   Meet the selection criteria of lowest price
*   Meet the trade agreements mentioned above

###How to Respond

Interested suppliers must submit their bids electronically through the Ariba Discovery website or Canada Buys. For more information, please visit the Ariba Discovery link listed above or contact the contracting representative, Valerie Matheson, at <valerie.matheson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>.

####Contact Information:

Valerie Matheson  
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND)  
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage  
Gatineau, Quebec, K
